mapper.select: select od.seq, od.itemCode, od.quantity, od.orderDate, it.name, it.uup from orderlist od, item it where od.itemCode = it.code and od.branchCode=#{branchCode} order by od.seq asc
mapper.insert: insert into orderlist values(orderlist_seq.nextval, #{ itemCode }, #{ quantity }, (select branchCode from member where id = #{ memId }), sysdate)
